name: Project Boost (Caddy_98)
description:
Welcome to my first 3D game !!! Project Booster 

It is recommended to open the game in full screen

This game comes from a section of a course I'm following on Udemy on Unity 3D. I leave the link of the course below: https://www.udemy.com/unitycourse2/ (Not Affiliated)

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

To Svilupparegiochi.it: The game does not have a different user interface or menu as following the course I was allowed to learn the technical aspect of 3D video game development.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Game description:

This game is of Arcade genre and consists in commanding a rocket in order to drive the rocket from the launching platform to the landing platform. Moving from one level to another (Currently 7 levels present) you will find more and more obstacles on your way. Will you be able to overcome them and get to the bottom?

Game controls:

  • Press 'Space' to accelerate
  • Press 'A' to rotate the rocket to the left
  • Press 'D' to rotate the rocket to the right

Much simpler than you could have expected (maybe) ...

What are you waiting for? The countdown has started: Run to play !!
